path_to_mlip2.MLIP_DIR: path to the directory of mlip-2
path_to_mlip2.#MLIP_DIR: path to the mlip2 dir, # e.g. '/Users/hello/mlip-2'
path_to_mlip2.MLIP_LIB: path to the file of lib_mlip_interface.a
path_to_mlip2.#MLIP_LIB: path to the lib_mlip_interface.a file., e.g. '/Users/hello/opt/mlip-2/lib/lib_mlip_interface.a'
